SEARCH
Package org.apache.calcite.rel.externalize

Interface RelDotWriter.WriteOption

Enclosing class:
RelDotWriter
@Immutable public static interface RelDotWriter.WriteOption
Options for displaying the rel node plan in dot format.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final RelDotWriter.WriteOption
    DEFAULT
    Default configuration.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default int
    maxNodeLabelLength()
    The max length of node labels.
    default int
    maxNodeLabelPerLine()
    The max length of node label in a line.
    @Nullable Predicate<RelNode>
    nodePredicate()
    Predicate for nodes that need to be highlighted.

  • Field Details

    • DEFAULT

      static final RelDotWriter.WriteOption DEFAULT
      Default configuration.

  • Method Details

    • maxNodeLabelLength

      @Default default int maxNodeLabelLength()
      The max length of node labels. If the label is too long, the visual display would be messy. -1 means no limit to the label length.

    • maxNodeLabelPerLine

      @Default default int maxNodeLabelPerLine()
      The max length of node label in a line. -1 means no limitation.

    • nodePredicate

      @Nullable Predicate<RelNode> nodePredicate()
      Predicate for nodes that need to be highlighted.
